mapper.select: select m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden from ums_admin_role_relation arr left join ums_role r on arr.role_id = r.id left join ums_role_menu_relation rmr on r.id = rmr.role_id left join ums_menu m on rmr.menu_id = m.id where arr.admin_id = #{adminId} and m.id is not NULL group by m.id

select m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden from ums_role_menu_relation rmr left join ums_menu m on rmr.menu_id = m.id where rmr.role_id = #{roleId} and m.id is not null group by m.id

select r.id id, r.create_time createTime,r.`name` `name`, r.url url, r.description description, r.category_id categoryId from ums_role_resource_relation rrr left join ums_resource r on rrr.resource_id = r.id where rrr.role_id = #{roleId} group by r.id
